import styles from '../elements_CSS/CardDetail.module.css' import React from 'react' export const Details = ({id, name, continent, image, capital, subregion, area, population,activities})=>{ const style = { backgroundImage:`url(${image})`, backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', backgroundPosition: 'center', backgroundSize: 'cover' } const message = 'there are no activities associated with the country' return(
{name.toUpperCase()}
Code
{id}
Continent
{continent}
Capital
{capital}
Subregion
{subregion}
Population
{population}
Area
{area}
FLAG
ACTIVITIES
{(activities.length === 0)?
johan
: activities.map((el)=>el.map((el,i)=>
NAME
{el.name}
DURATION
{el.duration} Minutes
DIFFICULTY
{el.difficulty}
SEASON
{el.season}
))}
) }
